name: The Jumping Burrito
description: Sin descripción

name: Slime Rule
description: A monster suddenly appeared, took over Uzacan castle. It destroyed a series of the world's top heroes, caused a worldwide uproar. The most shocking fact is that it's just a small slime.

name: Hauling Away
description: Alone and stuck in job that he has no passion for, Ray is about to meet someone that may change his life forever. Will they be able to find salvation together?

name: Universal Flight Simulator
description: Fasten your seatbelts and be ready for the most realistic and beautiful flight of your life! Universal Flight Simulator will let you pilot from old dusters to modern jets and helicopter.

name: John Brick
description: John Brick is a game with a very simple and challenging mechanics, just be quick between shooting and protecting yourself

name: It's Dark
description: There has been a containment breach in a secret facility located deep underground. Experiment E.C.H.O has escaped and is running loose. The lab has gone into shutdown mode, and it's dark...

name: I Love Finding More Pups
description: Travel through all new locations as you befriend and adopt all new pups!

name: Ballex 2: The Hanging Gardens
description: Ballex² is a third-person rolling ball game, the sequel to Ballex. You will control a ball, enjoy the scenery of the four seasons, overcome obstacles and solve various puzzles.

name: Dango!
description: Dango! is a casual liquid puzzle game. You need to pass a variety of levels, draw a path through which the liquid will flow and fill the vessel.

name: Real Rage
description: Are you too calm? Do you want to be angry? If the answer is yes, you have to play this game! You have to use all of your skills to complete the stages, and defeat the boss. There are many traps, enemies, and other surprises on every level. The deathcounter is waiting for you!

name: Kinkoi: Golden Time
description: Welcome to Noble Private Academy, an institution that cultivates the wealthiest, most well-connected students in all of Japan! At this boarding school, one must be willing to accept all of its refined and dignified teachings or be met with strict opposition!

name: Five Nights at Sexy's
description: Welcome to your new summer job at the Sexy Fucking Club, where men come to have a good time! The main attraction, of course, is the new generation of sex dolls. These are animatronic robots programmed to do whatever you want!

name: Doctor Nanobot
description: A microbiology themed retro shoot-em-up.

name: WordMaster
description: Create as many words long words as possible within a minute using 7 random letters.

name: The Patient: After Hours
description: You are a night worker who has to clean up after a long day of trading at the local mall. But as the night quickly progresses you start to realize that something isn't quite right.

name: Ballads at Midnight
description: When a sarcastic bard is arrested and exiled to an abandoned castle, she expected to be at the mercy of a hungry, blood-thirsty vampire. She soon discovers that the vampire, Lucius, is not starving: he is gravely bored. She may just survive on borrowed time, one ballad each midnight.

name: Shred! Remastered
description: With flowy level design and addictive gameplay - every inch of trail will keep you on the edge and keep you coming back for more! A total remake of “Shred! 1” remade with love, from the ground up.

name: Subway Surfers Tag
description: Join the Crew across multiple off-limit, interactive city locations. Skate over the retired trains in the railyard, play in the park after dark, pick up some power-ups at the cargo docks or investigate the mysterious underground. But watch out! Guard is not about to put up with these shenanigans and is hot on your heels - and this time, he’s brought reinforcements!

name: Pinball Girlfriend
description: An alternative to pinball games! ! Resource allocation, shooting skills, luck bonus, can you fight to the end? ? Of course, beautiful CG girls are also essential~

name: Faraway
description: Escaping the planet is your main goal.

name: Hot Milf 7
description: Hentai is not just 2D girls, this is a whole art.

name: Reborn Souls
description: As a Maiden of the Ecclesia, Sabrina is in charge of special assignments, in lands where dark magic, urban legends and folkore are all real. While investigating a new incident in one of the appeased villages, she will learn much more than she bargained for...

name: Tratritle
description: A little master lived happily with his maids. But what bothered him was that the maids were too naive and simple. One day, he received a letter from his father. He thought he could solve the current problem... But unexpectedly, another succubus maid came. Will he still be a good boy or...?

name: Homemade TCG
description: Yugi-inspired card game -roguelike with an extra deck. Enemies use the same cards / rules as you. Reduce opponent's life from 20 to 0; by playing cards and attacking. Pick a card of 3-choices after each win. Use the deck-builder between games. A lot of unique cards, 5 floors, and the final boss.

name: Mojito the Cat
description: Mojito the Cat will push your space vision to the limit, use the logic to find the shortest path to the exit. Rotate the pieces to reach all coins, get the fish scrape and go to the gate to jump to the next level

name: Ultimate Muscle Roller Championship
description: Take part in an incredible racing championship, among the most pumped up guys from all over the world.

name: Fight of Steel: Infinity Warrior
description: Fight of Steel: Infinity Warrior is a new fighting game with ultimate freedom. Players will have the opportunity to customize their own fighter from the appearance to fighting moves.

name: The Deep Diving of FloodDragon
description: "Landing on the moon and diving into the deep sea" is a human dream. In this game, you will experience this great journey. Understand the structure of Jiaolong, drive the submarine with the deepest diving depth in the world to dive into the deep sea and explore unknown places.

name: Sentry City
description: Sentry City is a cyberpunk-style side-scroller with gameplay that is part trial-and-error, and part reaction time based. Traverse the city using the motorcycle overworld map, blast and think your way through the levels, and fight tough bosses to uncover who is behind the city's AI disruption.

name: Sandream
description: Ella is an autistic girl with blurry memories in the world of sand. She faced many difficulties alone, and with the help of many friends, she bravely moved forward, and faced challenges such as pain, depression, and war one by one, and finally grow up bravely.

name: Immortal Tactics: War of the Eternals
description: Experience a Fast-Paced Roguelite Turn-Based Strategy game with a New Turn-Based Engine which will need you to plan early on and create strategies that would lead your army to victory. Create an army with different Characters and Leaders to choose from and explore this Roguelite world.

name: DC League of Super-Pets: The Adventures of Krypto and Ace
description:
DC League of Super-Pets: The Adventures of Krypto and Ace is a 2022 video game tie-in to the 2022 movie DC League of Super-Pets.

The player controls Krypto and Ace as they take to the skies to protect the animal population of Metropolis from a new and looming threat.

name: Chimeraland
description:
ChimeraLand is an open-world survival game with strong RPG elements set in a prehistoric, mythical world.
You need to gather resources, craft items, grow crops, and research technologies. Start from building a survival shelter to constructing a massive base in outer space!

name: Fira
description: A lovely and emotional 3rd-person puzzle game centered on Kara: a young woman who deals with a painful past experience. Armed with her elemental skill, help her try to find her way accross a mysterious land and put an end to this pain.

name: Citizens: Far Lands
description: Citizens is a blend between turn based city builder and a puzzler for strategy masterminds. Build a thriving settlement, extract and process resources and manage your population by catering to their needs, thus allowing you to build bigger and better!

name: Kingdomfall
description: Kingdomfall is a multiplayer PvP fantasy slasher with action packed, player-skill based combat system.

name: Fire & Maneuver
description: From the team that brought you The Armchair Historian comes a new strategy game set in the Victorian Era. As muskets become rifles and infantry are replaced by Gatling guns, you must adapt to a rapidly changing battlefield. This is a new age, not of courage and chivalry, but of Blood and Iron.

name: Video Game Fables
description:
"Video Game Fables" is a fun, lighthearted RPG adventure set in a once-traditional RPG world that hasn't had a player in decades.

The world's script gets completely ruined by someone calling herself "The Forsaken Princess." It's up to Aru (the world's princess), Nate (an NPC aspiring to be a hero), and Tator (the villain's son) to get things back to normal...or maybe change everything forever.

name: Westwood Shadows
description: A police detective gets involved into a case about a missing couple. Soon he finds out that the husband was working at a mental asylum and he was conducting a research over a mysterious disappearance of patients. Among the files there is something he would never thought he would find.

name: Supaplex GO!
description: RUN! BUT DON'T FORGET TO THINK!

name: Mystical Island
description: You are a brave captain of your ship.You were on your way for new adventures, but there was a shipwreck at sea and now you find yourself on a desert island.

name: Alexander the Great: Secrets of Power
description: An adventure/hidden object game.

name: House Party
description: House Party, in its concept and sense of humor, is inspired by the adventure style games of the 80s and 90s like Leisure Suit Larry and Monkey Island, but it is rendered in a beautiful full-3D first-person context.

name: Last Chance for Turnabout
description: A cold case, a suicide, and a murder intersect. The man at the apex of it all takes on an impossible defence.

name: Umokay 64DS 6: Wrath of the Blood Eye
description: Sin descripción

name: Hot Wheels: Retro Game Customization Pack
description: For all of us who spent hours at the Arcades, this pack will take you back in time to the glorious 8-bit years! Pixelated style for Basement and Unleashed Profile with a retro touch everyone will love, even those born in this millennium.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles: Additional Costume Pack - Kimetsu Academy Summer Uniforms
description:
In-game costumes that can be used in Versus Mode.
Kimetsu Academy Summer Uniforms are now available for Kimetsu Academy Tanjiro Kamado, Kimetsu Academy Nezuko Kamado, Kimetsu Academy Zenitsu Agatsuma, Kimetsu Academy Inosuke Hashibira, and Kimetsu Academy Giyu Tomioka.

name: Bit Hotel
description: Bit Hotel is a social-first pixel-art gaming metaverse, in which users can hang out, compete for leaderboard rewards and earn income. All in-game items (NFTs), such as characters, rooms and furniture, have been integrated on a blockchain and all have their own unique perks.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Megami Tensei Gaiden - Shinyaku Last Bible
description: Together with the demon, we will open up our destiny. The story that is the end of everything and the beginning of everything.

name: Toree's 3D Platformer Collection
description:
Toree and his friends invite you to jump through four colourful and varied 3d platformer games. Toree's 3D Platformer Collection includes the following four titles: Toree 3D (incl. Toree Jumbled Jam extra levels), Toree 2 (incl. winter-themed extra levels), Macbat 64 and Regina & Mac.

These four games represent a variety of playstyles from arcade-style high speed platforming in Toree 2 to precise collection-based platforming in Regina & Mac.

name: Stones Keeper: King Aurelius
description:
Stones Keeper uses a turn-based combat system, which lets you use environmental objects as protection against your enemies. As well as the ability to break some of the environmental objects down to move faster, which, in turn, opens up a lot of strategic possibilities.

You can customize your squad by recruiting new companions with multiple specializations, skills and weapon preferences. Missions and battles will be just as diverse: Command your warriors to besiege enemy settlements or defend yours, protect your order's churches, escort civilian wagons, lay siege to enemy castles, aid your allies, and capture new technologies to upgrade your castle.

name: Mr. Meat 2: Prison Break
description: Mr. Meat is back!

name: Master Sleuth Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Absolute Deduction Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Escape Academy: Deluxe Edition
description: Enjoy the expanded Escape Academy experience with the Escape Academy Deluxe Edition! Play over 20 masterfully hand-crafted Escape Rooms in this Deluxe Edition bundle. Includes: Escape Academy base game + Season Pass.

name: Arcade Archives: Dragon Saber
description: A powerful legend of immortal dragons

name: On Sunday
description:
Minimalistic in style, this game brings you on an unusual Sunday walk.
Are these dangers of the outer world or of your own soul?

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Character Pack Hata no Kokoro
description:
Introducing "Hata no Kokoro" the expressive pokerface!
Has the "Combo Morph: 3 Types" ability that gives you three types of Special Bubbles depending on the color of your fifth combo.
When the 5th combo is performed by a red/purple bubble, a "Flam Bubble" appears on the opponent's field.
Yellow/Green will grant you a "Thunderswipe Bubble", and Blue will grant you a Paint Bubble.
Also, the Spell Card is a distinctive character!

name: Cheese Runner
description: Trade illicit cheese in a dystopian cyberpunk city filled with police killbots trying to hunt you down in this ASCII Art text-based early 80s retro trading game. Like a fine blue cheese, this isn't for everyone.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Looney Tunes
description: This time the competition gets really animated! The most beloved Looney Tunes heroes hit the track! And that's not all, folks! Have fun with a new environment, the ACME Rockets module and custom elements for your Basement and Unleashed profile!

name: Silver Falls: Ghoul Busters
description: Silver Falls: Ghoul Busters is a throwback action-platformer set in the mysterious world of Silver Falls. In the early 90's, Starlin Allerdyce and Atticus Longdraw, two best friends forever, hang out in their treehouse. Late one night, real monsters appear. Will these two boys survive a terrible night?

name: Super Toy Cars 1 & 2 Bundle
description: Super Toy Cars and Super Toy Cars 2 are now available bundled together. Enjoy both games from this series where you can race over a total of 33 different tracks from a unique point of view. Experience arcade racing controlling small toy cars and advance …

name: Bughouse
description: Play as Christopher, a kid left home alone with a terrifying STALKER on the loose! Try and survive in this 80's, PS1 inspired, Home Invasion Survival Horror game - OR DIE TRYING!

name: Pet Rock
description:
The official Pet Rock featured in “Minions: The Rise of Gru” is now available on the iPhone & iPad.
Adopt a Pet Rock to nurture from a baby to an adult by regularly feeding, cleaning disciplining, and playing with it.
In order to help you do this you need to regularly check your Pet Rock's vitals with the real-time monitor which easily displays your Pet Rock's vital stats and what needs attending too.
Keep your Pet Rock happy by playing the included Rock Paper Scissors mini bonus game with it.
Your Pet Rock lives in your time zone, when it's night for you, it’s night in Pet Rock World, no matter where in the World you live.

name: Musynx: Deluxe Edition
description: Musynx is the next destination of choice for rhythm game fans to rock out and stretch their rhythmic fingers! The simple, organic game mechanics will put players to the test with rhythms and beats like no other. With multiple difficulty levels and a huge range of genres to choose from (pop, classical, trance, vocaloid, R&B, and more). Deluxe Edition includes all DLCs and future update songs!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Jetman
description: Pixel Game Maker Series: Jetman is a simple jumping action game using only one button.

name: Elena's Journal: Unfinished Expedition
description: Help Elena discover the City of the Amazons in a Time Management adventure!

name: Otoko Cross: Pretty Boys Klondike Solitaire
description: Meet 5 cute cross-dressing characters as they challenge you to classic solitaire! Win with the cards you're dealt and unlock new outfits for your companions in this this celebration of Japanese "otokonoko" style and sub-culture.

name: Burning Requiem: Fates
description: "Burning Requiem: Fates" is a new 2-On-2 Indie Fighting Game produced by Project Requiem! Seeking to shake up the fighting game formula to bring some new flair! Featuring characters coming from the new tie in webcomic series of "Burning Requiem"!

name: Dalo
description: Dalo, a combination of dot and halo. A fun and simple puzzle game where you should find a path that goes through all lines only passing through the same line once.

name: Mythic Origins
description: Explore an infinite, procedurally generated labyrinth. Discover a world packed with puzzles, enemies, bosses, and treasure. Join forces with fellow heroes to hunt down the gods, or strike out alone and be the first to discover uncharted territory. Become Mythic.

name: Tomb Defender
description: Sandbox tower defense game in the style of a pulp adventure movie. With full control over the layout of the tomb. Includes challenges and a procedural map generator.

name: Ein's Sword
description: Simple field battles and training. Defeat enemies that appear in the field and obtain ability points every time you level up. Raise your preferred status and advance the battle to an advantage. Easy to use and comfortable to play.

name: Strategic Command: American Civil War
description: For the first time in the series’ history, Strategic Command will be taking you to the 19th century battlefields of the American Civil War. In this turn-based strategy game, you will control the armies, research, production and diplomatic policy of either the Union or the Confederacy during a time of great innovation and dramatic battles. Your decisions will determine whether the United States leaves this conflict as one nation or two.

name: The Twilight Zone VR
description: Where nothing is as it seems and everything feels possible.

name: Goddess of War Essa II
description: "Goddess of War Essa II" is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The background of the story is World War II. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the air.

name: Isolania
description: A plague called "The Sadness" has devastated civilization. A mysterious society rose from the ashes, deciding the only way to protect its citizens is to confine them in cells. There are 3 Edicts governing this new civilization: Stay in your cell. Watch television. Never talk about the outside.

name: Egg Over It: Fall Flat From the Top
description: Take on a real tactical jumping adventure with Egg Over It!!! A challenge where you'll have to lift the egg to the top in search of its source, but explore carefully; a single failed jump could lead to a long fall.

name: Ody Mos
description: A lewd physic-based 3D puzzle game.

Psychedelic 3D maze-runner. Each level is more difficult than the last one. Fight an onslaught of enemies as you try to find your way to the center of the island. You play as a revenant, avenging your death, and trying to free your sister from prison.

name: Running on Magic
description: Woosh! Get ready to flee! Welcome to Running on Magic, a forced-scroll platformer where a quirky wizard is being chased by a tireless Grim Reaper. Hurry through procedurally-generated mindfully drawn environments as you defeat unalike enemies. Don’t let the Grim Reaper get to you!

name: Toilet Chronicles
description: Toilet Chronicles - is a public toilet simulator with mystical setting where you need to find a way out of the toilet with the help of your toilet neighbor. Find a way to escape with your partner until one of you dies. Every choice you make brings you to a different outcome.

name: Eyes in the Dark
description: Fight with light against the dark in this “roguelight” platformer starring Victoria Bloom! Drive back the darkness that's overrun Bloom Manor and conquer swarms of creatures as you discover powerful new items to upgrade your arsenal. Are you ready to enter the ever-changing manor?

name: Before the Night
description: "What do rabbits eat at night?" Before The Night is a horror action adventure. Try to survive in a small and cute animal village! At night, animal friends turn into crazy monsters! Join the cute pet Lisa's journey!

name: Mothmen 1966
description: Mothmen 1966 is a 'Pixel Pulp' - a visual novel featuring a fusion of exceptional writing and stunning illustration, inspired by mid-20th century pulp fiction and 80s home computer graphics - set amongst the strange occurrences of the Leonid meteor shower of 1966.

name: Cursed Treasure 2: Ultimate Edition - Tower Defense
description: Why be good when you can be... bad? Cursed Treasure 2 is a classic tower-defense game, remastered and carefully re-balanced. Build towers of powerful orcs, demons, and undead, and master powerful spells, to protect your precious hoard from all manner of no-good do-gooders.

name: Clanfolk
description: Clanfolk is a medieval colony sim set in the Scottish Highlands. Harness your environment to survive - fish, gather, hunt, and farm as you prepare for the harsh winter. Build an inn, trade with other clans, have children and marry them off - live life and prosper across the generations.

name: Halley's Dream
description: Halley's Dream is a beautiful third-person adventure walking simulator game about a husky dog and his dreams. When dreaming, the dog will enjoy an amazing journey in a stylized and colourful world, learn about the wonders of our universe and make friends.

name: Crossing Frontier
description: Crossing Frontier is a 2D action RPG. Choose your favorite characters and join with your teammate to defeat your enemies!

name: Meteora
description: Be a meteor in a constant race for survival in a young and chaotic universe by dodging, chasing & taking down other meteors in Meteora. Power up, strategize and put your skills to the test in our spectacular arcade combat racer!

name: Lunar Axe
description: After a big earthquake in the city center, ruins of an old building collapse and you end up trapped inside an abandoned house. Find a way out and unravel the mystery of inexplicable tremors, revealing ancient secrets and a mystical artifact, before the city is destroyed.

name: PowerWash Simulator
description: Release the Pressure with PowerWash Simulator! Wash away your worries with the soothing sounds of high-pressure water. Fire up your power washer and blast away every speck of dirt and grime you can find, all with the simple satisfaction of power-washing to a sparkling finish.

name: Blackout Rugby Manager
description: Blackout Rugby is a modern, multiplayer, social, world class Rugby Manager Game. Take control of a novice rugby club and sidestep and fend your way to glory. Take on people all around the world as you strategise, conquer the league, battle your way up the ladder, and build up your club infrastructure.

name: Super UFO Fighter
description: Break! Hunt! & Scramble! Super UFO Fighter is a unique battle action game where cute UFOs fight. It is possible for everyone can compete happily by simple rules like sports!

name: Dinkum
description: G’Day! Get ready to start a new fair Dinkum life and build your new home out in the bush. Explore tropical eucalyptus forests, scorching deserts and cool billabongs on an Island inspired by the wild Australian outback. Take care of giant wombats, play with friends and get ready for a ripper time!

name: Light&Dark
description: Light & Dark is a roguelike platformer. You play as Victoria Bloom, a young girl trapped in an old mansion afflicted by a mysterious darkness. You have to find your way through the dark and face the horrors inside, with only your flashlight to light your path.

name: Rabbitmaiden Softbook
description: Rabbitmaiden Softbook is a companion visual novel to the mainline rabbitmaiden softworks vns (e.g. heartlovepowertemple)

name: Speed Squared
description: Speed Squared is the eighth edition of PUSS, BluePineapple72's (semi) monthly speedmapping series. These maps were built with BigBrik's Adventures of Square total conversion. Download Square here:

name: Genshin Impact: Summer Fantasia
description:
Version 2.8 of Genshin Impact, which included:
• New character: Shikanoin Heizou
• Returning limited-time area: Golden Apple Archipelago
• New outfits for Diluc and Fischl
• New story quest for Kaedehara Kazuha
• New hangout events for Shikanoin Heizou
• New main event: Summertime Odyssey
• …and more!

name: Hungry for Home: A Cat's Tail
description:
Suspenders is off on a grand journey to get home!

With a food truck and his little brother Chibisuke in tow, come follow the Nyansukes as they travel the world!

Trapped in a box, and left across the globe, how do we get home...!? Luckily our new friends are here to help

name: Time Lock VR 2
description:
Mystical version of the Timelock VR Games series.

The player has to free the soul of the ancestor imprisoned by the sorcerer in a magic stone. To solve riddles, you will need to move in time. Be careful, at the time of moving something may go wrong.

In a dream, the player is his ancestor and asks to free his soul. Find a place in which the element is hidden in which his soul is imprisoned.

name: Corru.Observer
description: Corru.Observer is a hard sci-fi visual novel, point-and-click adventure about a contractor hired by an intelligence agency to hack into an alien biological computing device dredged up from the bottom of the ocean.

name: The Tale of Bistun: Digital Collector's Edition
description:
The Tale of Bistun Digital Collector's Edition contains:
- Digital version of The Tale of Bistun
- Digital Artbook containing sketches and fully-fledged art works
- The Tale of Bistun original soundtrack by Hamidreza Ansari

name: Genocide
description: Sin descripción

name: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles: Tengen Uzui Character Pack
description: Tengen Uzui will become a playable character. Additional contents such as quotes and profile photos will also be included.

name: Hellpoint: Ultimate Edition
description: Hellpoint Ultimate Edition includes full game and Blue Sun DLC to reveal the complete story of Irid Novo, for those who can understand it. Get it for complete Hellpoint experience!

name: Kung Fu Er San
description: Kung Fu Er San is an 2D retro pixel fighting game inspired by the old classics.

name: Matamarcianos
description: Simple freeware doujin shooting game where you shoot enemy waves before the time runs out. Get hit once and it's game over.

name: Elohim Eternal: Prologue
description: A FREE Prologue to Elohim Eternal: The Babel Code, a turn-based JRPG-inspired indie title inspired by Xenogears and Shin Megami Tensei. Play as Joshwa as he helps an ex-Judge let go of his past. Battle beasts with mechanical parts using elemental and divine magic.

name: Ginger: The Tooth Fairy
description: Help Ginger in her Tooth Fairy quest in this cute, educational and fun platformer for all ages. Cute graphics and catchy music, fun gameplay and hidden secrets will put a smile on your face.

name: The Whiskey Story
description: Become one of the biggest whiskey company in the world with this breathtaking story of young entrepreneur with small dream which comes through.

name: Cozy Time
description: Cozy Time provides you with a cozy environment to focus, relax or rest without being disturbed.

name: Worm Runner
description: Endless runner game where are 6 different maps with obstacles

name: Leap of Phase: Samantha
description:
Leap of Phase is a first-person puzzle game. You will need to solve puzzle rooms by utilizing personal teleporter units. Place up to three of these at any time you want.

You thought it would be the chance of a lifetime when tech giant IRT hired you to work in their new testing facility. But now… you’re a guina pig for experimental teleporting technology and suspect that something is wrong with this company. Very wrong...

name: Necrosmith
description: A necromancer simulator. Assemble the dead using different body parts while upgrading your tower, combine the abilities of the different fantastic races to fight your way through the hordes of enemies and overrun the ’chosen ones’. To tell the truth, the dead are pretty, uhm, dumb.

name: Rabbitoad
description: A frog-like rabbit is the main character's high-difficulty 2D action In order to fulfill the wish that "I will not be mistaken for a frog" Aim for the place of the goddess.

name: Tilefinder
description: Tilefinder is an indie rogue-like turn-based grid RPG in which you slay hordes of monsters through a procedurally generated kingdom to find the legendary Tile shards! While excavating the castle, a floor tile came loose, releasing eldritch corruption that overtook the kingdom. Now, with the floor tile broken, it is your job to bring all the pieces together and assemble the Tile to seal the evil back where it came from!

name: Escape Academy
description: Welcome to the Escape Academy. Train to become the ultimate Escapist. Solve Puzzles. Hack Servers. Meet the Faculty. Brew the perfect cup of tea. Escape Rooms in single player or co-op with a friend - local or online!

name: TimeLock VR 2
description: TimeLock VR 2 - the player must free the soul of the ancestor, imprisoned by the sorcerer in stone. To travel in timeyou will need to create spells. Time travel will take place in different eras of the past.

name: Queer Man Peering Into A Rock Pool.jpg
description: A joyful, strange experience in which a middle-aged queer man toddles around an island attempting to re-furnish his empty house.

name: Profession investigator
description: Profession Investigator is an immersive simulator with a text-based interface in which you have to deal with real criminal cases. The game uses materials from court archives and specialized literature.

name: Undergrave
description: Undergrave is a tactical roguelike which moving, jumping, dashing and 𝘁𝗵𝗿𝗼𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝘀𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗱 𝗮𝘄𝗮𝘆 strategically is vital for success.

name: Grid Leaper
description: VR Platforming taken to the next level. Jump. Climb. Grab. Swing. Fly. Dodge. Do whatever it takes to reach the goal. Taking place across 90 levels, Grid Leaper brings you on a journey through 20 unique environments designed to harden you into a master.

name: The Tale of Bistun
description: The Tale of Bistun follows an amnesiac stone-carver on his journey up the slopes of the Mount Bistun. He’ll have to battle legions of monstrous foes using fast-paced, melee combat and powerful magical abilities as he explores the real world and the mysterious place, known as the Revelations Realm.

name: Loopmancer
description: Loopmancer is a 3D horizontal roguelite action game with realistic graphics that takes place in a cyberpunk universe. Players play as a detective who comes back to life after an unexpected death, and battle in this lifelike and futuristic city of the east.

name: Urbek City Builder
description: Urbek is a city building game where you can build your own neighbourhoods: from nightlife district to industrial district. Don't exhaust your natural resources before you have an educated population to build more efficient structures.

name: Jetman
description: OK! Jet! It's finally your turn! Let's defeat the evil organization Violets together!

name: Math Mayhem!!
description: Math Mayhem!! is a math game available on mobile platforms. Master arithmetic, including multiplication, addition, subtraction, and division, while having fun and relieving stress.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Pibby Corrupted
description: Sin descripción

name: Wade
description: A stroll along the shore of a wide river that flows into the underworld. As the player ventures deeper, the scenery starts to shift and they may encounter oddities or curiosities.

name: Waternet
description: Arduboy port of Waternet, which is a multiplatform water pipe puzzle game written for old consoles and handhelds.

name: Zen Blossom
description: Sin descripción

name: TCQ
description: TCQ is a platform and puzzle game for the ZX Spectrum and MSX, inspired by Mondrian‘s paintings, and Kandinsky‘s basic shapes.

name: Battle Forces
description:
Fps games and multiplayer shooting games are your favorite genres? What can be better than the classical realistic one? The shooter that comes with a mix of your favorite multiplayer games features and new!
Meet new shooting game with a capital S - Battle Forces! Let's dive into the world of fps shooter!

name: Missing
description: A short VN style game made in RPG Maker in which you try to find out what happened to your missing friend.

name: The Three Kingdoms: The Dynamic
description: Sin descripción

name: Save the Doge
description: Draw lines to protect the dog from the bees.

name: Apex Legends Mobile: Distortion
description: Greetings Legends and welcome to a brand new Apex Legends Mobile season: Distortion. We’ve got a lot to cover, including a new legend, game modes and much more so let's jump into it!

name: School Girl Apartment Paradise
description:
Life is looking up! You just finished your college freshman exams and even landed an internship abroad… But when your grandmother suddenly falls ill, it's up to you to look after her apartment complex. That seems simple enough, until you realize that not only is it an all-girls apartment, but there’s also a greedy yakuza boss looking to tear it down!

As if being the landlord wasn't hard enough, you now have three beautiful girls all vying for your attention. A sexy and suave actress, a perky high school senior, and… her mother?! Can you save the complex all while juggling the needs of your beguiling tenants?

name: Saint Seiya: Legends of Justice
description: Saint Seiya: Legends of Justice is a licensed adaptation of the Saint Seiya manga, produced by the original team, with high-quality graphics that recreate the classic plot. Follow Seiya, Ikki, Shiryu, Hyoga, and Shun as they venture into the Sanctuary, challenge the 12 Gold Saints, destroy the Pope's conspiracy, and save the goddess Athena.

name: Warriors Orochi 3: Ultimate - Definitive Edition
description: With all the content of "Warriors Orochi 3", new characters and episodes that deepen the story, new modes, and DLC that has been released for other platforms, enjoy the world of Orochi to your heart's content!

name: Mira: A Bird's Flight
description: Play as a bird, avoid traps, over 46 levels, and a final boss to beat

name: I Commissioned Some Bees 3
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many bees as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 10 art pieces to choose from, and 1000+ bees, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: White Paper
description: What is your subconscious mind trying to tell you when you are mindlessly drawing on a piece of paper? Maybe someone trapped there, in a dark, damp basement and yes, screaming for help and trying to break out?

name: Workaholic
description: Workaholic is a frantic rouge-lite FPS where you go on a rampage through a hellish office space as your grasp on reality crumbles.

name: Prototypers
description: An arcade-style controller-friendly physics-based RTS game

name: Defenders of Asteria
description: The time has come to defend your lands from the hordes invading forces. Build up your defenses and summon mighty heroes to aid you as you become one of the Defenders of Asteria!

name: Portal Defense
description: Our game is a basic tower defense game where monsters are coming in through a portal are trying to destroy your tower! The only way to stop them is to send out your units, level up your tower and try to outwit them!

name: Omnichess
description: Omnichess is the game that allows you to design and play your very own chess variants! With AI and online play there are a huge variety of options.

name: Nuts Protocol
description: You might think this is yet another Tower Defense game. Well, friend, you are not wrong! The twist? It's fast-paced! Your greatest resource is positioning - and moving around is a must. Also, you control an orange Squirrel equipped with more-than-military-grade turrets! OMG - can it get any better?

name: Triennale Game Collection Vol. 2
description: The Triennale Game Collection Volume 2 is a free virtual exhibition of video games created for the 23rd International Exhibition of Triennale Milano by five of the world’s most renowned independent game designers, showcasing these artists’ experimental approach to interactivity.

name: Bubble Night
description: Let's run through the quiet night sky through the forest of buildings with the little girl.

name: Try Me
description: Try Me is a 3D Platform game where moving a ball to a floating square has never been more difficult. This game is completely torque based and all about momentum.

name: Second Thoughts
description: Second Thoughts is a psychological text-based game where each day you are tasked with executing someone based on the limited information provided until one person remains with their full story revealed.

name: Monument Valley 2: Panoramic Edition
description:
Perception meets reality in Monument Valley 2, the atmospheric return of the acclaimed smash hit Monument Valley. Explore, Grow and Guide Ro and her Child through a magical and moving world.

Discover illusionary pathways and delightful puzzles as you learn the secrets of The Sacred Geometry.

In this meditative and calming puzzle game, follow the heart warming story of Ro in her journey through motherhood. Rediscover independence through manipulating monuments and evolving paths to explore new, surreal, and mysterious worlds.

name: Monument Valley: Panoramic Edition
description:
Discover Monument Valley - A quest for forgiveness in a strikingly beautiful and mysterious world.

Embark on a journey of forgiveness along with Ida, the silent princess, through impossible environments and illusionary puzzles. Experience this meditative and calming puzzle game by manipulating monuments and creating evolving paths to explore new, surreal, and mysterious worlds.

Step into the new expanded world of Monument Valley: Panoramic Edition - and experience more intriguing impossibilities than ever before.

name: The Quest for Excalibur: Puy du Fou
description:
Get ready to travel back in time with the family with the first Puy du Fou video game!
Everyone knows the legend of King Arthur and his rival, the knight Lancelot du Lac. The latter, eaten away by jealousy, challenges him to a duel. Only Excalibur, the king's sword, breaks at the end of the fight and only the hilt remains. After a pact with Morgana, Arthur decides to throw what's left of Excalibur into troubled waters. But trapped by the fairy, he finds himself a prisoner of the kingdom of Avalon. Merlin the magician, commissioned by his beloved king, is responsible for finding the king's heir who can find the 15 pieces of the legendary sword, and bring King Arthur back from the underworld!

name: 4D Chess
description: VR Chess that isn't flat. Move up and down, between levels, and attack from all directions. All the pieces you know with extra moves that add interesting complexity. Several different volumes to choose from ranging from 4x4x4 to 8x8x8. 4d checkers, 3d chess and checkers are included.

name: Krut: The Mythic Wings
description: Krut: The Mythic Wings is a fast-paced hack and slash, side-scrolling platformer based on a 2018 Thai CG animated feature-length film "Krut: The Himmaphan Warriors", following the adventure of a Garuda warrior on the enchanted Island, Himmaphan.

name: An Uninvited Guest
description: The comfort of a child within his own home; spoilt when an unknown person starts lurking around. Use whatever you can to survive.

name: Lost Ember: VR Edition
description: Explore the remains of a fallen world from fascinating perspectives! Slip into the role of different animals to uncover the fate of an ancient world. Dive into deep waters, fly at lofty heights, dig underground as a mole, climb steep cliffs with a mountain goat, and many more!

name: Devil Bartender
description: The Gentle Night Tavern of Monster Girl is a story-rich bartender simulation game. In this different world of medieval fantasy and magic atmosphere, you will play the role of the boss and bartender, and work hard for the bar business together with the unique monster girl waiters.

name: Smasher and the Will o' the Thiccs
description: Golf meets growth! Smash your way through 11 exciting levels to save the city from the dreaded Will o the Thiccs!

name: Xel
description: Xel is an epic 3D sci-fi fantasy action-adventure. Explore the mysterious world of Xel and help protagonist Reid to uncover her enigmatic past. Make new friends and foes along the way and collect exciting gadgets to master challenging dungeons and solve time bending puzzles.

name: Hellpoint: Blue Sun
description: Travel to the Blue Sun parallel dimension to experience a new layer of story that reveals the one true cause of the Merge cataclysm. A ton of new armors and characters, a new “contract” system, dual wield weapons, three new sprawling locations to explore and die in

name: As Aventuras do Cueca Listrada
description: The story of the game was inspired by the imagination we have during childhood, where small challenges become great achievements, using a character based on a real-life child. Grab fruits and candies to save time, watch out for enemies and go through maps

name: Science Simulator
description: Science Simulator the science educational video game. explore, discover, learn.

name: Kayak VR: Mirage
description: Kayak VR: Mirage is a jaw-dropping and exhilarating journey through beautiful and unique locations, tailor-made for Virtual Reality. Maneuver our fully physically accurate kayak around checkpoints and crown yourself the fastest, or take it easy and use the free-ride mode for a leisurely trip and take in the sights of our varied locales, ranging from realistic to surreal.

name: Static of Eve
description: Sin descripción

name: Novopangea
description: Novopangea is a multi-player economy style strategy game. The game is designed around real world mechanics such as renting land, owning a business and completing jobs. Novopangea is set in a fantasy world comprised of six realms, each with their own story and lore and cast of characters.

name: Demon Speakeasy
description: Mix drinks and mingle with monster girls! Manage a bar staffed by cute waitresses and work hard to earn their affection! Take orders, make sophisticated small-talk and get lucky in the wildest ways possible...

name: Poop Killer Origins
description: Did you think "Poop Killer" was over? We're back with the latest game in the franchise, in "Poop Killer Origins" you'll find out how this killer who uses a toilet over his head came to be.

name: My Happy Place
description: The player watches old recordings from their (strangely familiar?) dreams, starting from what seems to be a normal day in the streets of your home town...

name: Woods of Disturbance
description: You woke up in the middle of the forest, next to you is a freshly dug grave, your hands are tied and you don't remember how you ended up here. You must survive and get out of this forest at any cost.

name: Red Dwarf
description: Chats with Bernard's Star about various things.

name: The Walking Dead: Last Mile
description:
The Walking Dead: Last Mile is perpetually accessible on Facebook as a clickable game that depicts the state of two groups of human survivors in zombie-plagued Alaska.

Users create a human survivor to survey the region, then select points of interest to trigger simple games involving shooting zombies, fixing power generators and more.
Performing well in those games earns players points that can be used to vote for narrative decisions about the fate of the survivor.

Its creators at GenVid call it a MILE, or Massively Interactive Live Event, and pitch it as part of the future of entertainment.

name: Furry Pet Dog Yiff Hentai
description: Very Short Adult-Only Visual Novel featuring furry dog girl in different sex scenes.

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Interior Design
description: Bright, modern and unconventional interior design. Each picture is a unique choice and vision of amazing people. Enjoy a selection of incredible designs.

name: Mystery Solitaire: Grimm's Tales 6
description: The magical medieval world of the Brothers Grimm fairy tales continues to fascinate with its diversity. The Middle Ages in all its splendor.

name: Frogo
description: Sin descripción

name: Downtown Jam
description: Revolt against Dr. Taste’s evil soda corporation by shredding the streets on your skateboard! Kickflip, grind and wall-ride your way downtown and beat your friends on the leaderboard! Trick and grind your way onto the leaderboards or wipe trying.

name: Smokyflex
description: Sin descripción

name: Bots City
description: Artificial intelligence is out of control. Only a Hero can stop this madness. The Hero's goal is to get to the main computer and disable it, thereby disabling all robots. Our hero has only one weapon, but that won't stop him!

name: Pylorus: Footsteps of Greed
description: A free 2d roguelite where enemies form a living ecosystem with rivalries and alliances. This is not your war: scavenge some gold and escape with your life... Or stay longer to uncover secrets and more riches, the choice is yours. Strange things happen to those that follow the footsteps of Greed...

name: The Creature: Escape Room
description: You are a detective sent to investigate the mistreatment of a mysterious creature. In this escape room there are not only puzzles, but also characters and history.

name: Platform Roll
description: PlatformRoll is a game with challenging obstacles including bombs, guns and gaps through platforms. Maneuver the ball across all the platforms in the dark with only a little light in order to reach the next level. Compete against an online leaderboard and see how fast you can complete each level.

name: Hoverboy
description: Explore different worlds and interact with the environment to the sound of a musical playlist showcasing music from Jesse Aidyn, Multi-Memory Controller, and Ginger Breaker.

name: Sabotris
description: Sabotris is a strategic, competitive, 3D block stacking game, but with a twist: you can sabotage your opponents, but be careful; you can also end up sabotaging yourself! Choose to play either by yourself to beat your own high score, against your friends or other players, or even against computer AI!

name: Nell Watson's Founder Life
description: Master your personal resources to achieve startup business success in this pro bono entrepreneurial life simulator game.

name: Ring War
description: Become your own bullet hell in Ring War! The online PvP top-down shooter where you can instantly join a lobby with up to 15 other players, scavenge a loadout from a pool of over 250 unique items, and battle to the top of the leaderboard.

name: Sakura Succubus 6
description: The sixth part of the Sakura Succubus series. Hiroki thought his harem of adoring women couldn’t get any bigger, but now a genuine European princess had taken a liking to him. What’s a (disgustingly) popular guy to do?!

name: Gloomgrave
description: Gloomgrave is a roguelike dungeon crawler with a retro pixel aesthetic. Upgrade your Gloomcrawler with unique perks and experiment with different builds as you try to survive each depth in search of the ultimate ancient relic.

name: Wavecade
description: Wavecade is a sci-fi, arcade-style, shoot-em-up where YOU control the speed of the game. Destroy blocks in style as you collect powerups and avoid hazards. How far can you go? Set your own rules and unlock your favourite mode to play.

name: Ark Defender
description: Roguelike missile command. Survive as long as you can aboard the Ark, humanity's last hope, in a hostile galaxy.

name: Escape From Hard Drive
description: EFHD is a game where programs change how game works. Modify and run the source files to create, destroy and move other objects.

name: Tempus
description: TEMPUS is a puzzle adventure game with time travel. Each time you advance, you will see the island where you live change over thousands of years. You can only travel forward so it is a one way trip, how far will you go?

name: Pixels: Digital Creatures
description: Pixels combines thrilling turn-based creature battles with the replayability of a roguelike. Pick your starter and journey through the Virtual World. Defy the odds by building a team of powerful Pixels to fight through the arenas! Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate Pixel Coach?

name: Time on Frog Island
description: Cast away on an island paradise complete with a cast of friendly frogs. Enjoy sandbox island life and explore at your own pace, solving sticky situations for your new friends and trading your way to fixing your ship!

name: Escape From Monster
description: You woke up in a dark room in an unknown place, can't remembering how you ended up here. You have an empty pockets, and the sounds from SOMETHING are heard outside the door. Try to solve the secrets of the Dark House and ESCAPE from the unknown MONSTER.

name: Esse Proxy
description: Blast your way through gangs, corporations, cults, and corrupt governments in a fast-paced, brutal top-down shooter, kill or die, learn and repeat. Located in a dystopian future not so far away, you will witness the conflicts of a group of rebels trying to be free.

name: Circadian Dice
description:
Circadian Dice is a game inspired by single-player deck-building games, but instead of upgrading a deck, you build up a set of dice!

The game has 26 different scenarios to fight through, each designed to allow for short game sessions. You can also play in different game modes, like playing through the game in a single-life Campaign Mode, as well as an endless randomized scenario.

Between every game, your dice are reset - but you unlock abilities, new characters, and powerful relics that become part of your permanent arsenal.

name: Neon Blight
description: Neon Blight is a 2D cyberpunk rogue-lite/gun store management game. Collect and sell guns, customize and manage your own gun store, fight your way through dangerous levels and get closer to the ultimate weapon.

name: ProtoBound
description: ProtoBound is an obstacle-avoidance game in which you navigate your character through various obstacles. It's inspired by bound-type custom maps for StarCraft.

name: TSE: Reloaded
description: In this new 2d action platformer, roll around as an oblong shape as you traverse the level geometry. In 'The Sleek Ellipsoid: Reloaded' (TSE: Reloaded) you can roll, jump and move around the level with total freedom!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: Futanari Roomate
description: Challenging jigsaw puzzles, featuring adult images of a girl having sex with her futanari roomate.

name: 11 Hào Xiǎo Zhèn Zōng Hé Zhèng
description: Sin descripción

name: Back to School: My Worst Day
description: Personal survival story loosely based on real events set in western Ukraine.

name: Spark
description: Spark is an immersive FPS VR game on Oculus App Lab with a fiercely competitive Death Match and Riding battle. With the battle Pass, leaderboard, and more coming weapons, you will definitely have a great time in Spark!

name: Greed
description: A dice game for two to four players.

name: Sicari 2: The Brink of Time
description:
A complete overhaul of SMW, set in an original universe!
Two main playable characters, Sicari and K-16, each with their own playstyle.
Seven unique bosses.
Tons of unique level themes, complete with entirely original graphics.
Six main worlds, a secret world, and a special world!
46 exits!

name: Welcome to Jane's Story in the World of Project: Summer Ice
description: Sin descripción

name: Pinball: Our Church and Halloween RPG - Machine #1
description: Sin descripción

name: Garden's Bane: DG's Quest
description: This is a difficult precision platformer.

name: Cutie Tutti Frutti
description: "Cutie Tutti Frutti" is a game based on "3 in a row" mechanics. The goal of match-3 puzzles is to make groups, lines and rows of 3 or more identical tiles.

name: Ph0b0s
description: Vaporcombat

name: Fire Story
description: FireStory - Top Down game about a firefighter, the player must fight off a flying fire extinguisher and direct the blow in such a way as to put out burning people and other sources of fire.

name: 124 Handle of the World
description:
Ever got that eerie feeling when you're in a bus, late at night? Ever thought about how much stronger that feeling must be when YOU'RE the driver? What may driving with the bus empty late at night feel like? This thought is what set me up to make this game.

In a PS1 style setting, you are a bus driver completing your night shift. You are getting tired, getting the last people off the bus to their destinations, until you're all alone. What might happen?

name: Kaiwa
description: A psychic horror sound novel developed in an omnibus format.

name: Cult Adorable
description: You play as a cult leader named Kiki, who wants as many people as possible to join her cute cult. Now she is very interested in one student, whom she considers an ideal recruit and is trying very hard to make him a part of her cult. I am sure you will enjoy accompanying Kiki and her friend Kotoko along the way.

name: Chikn Nuggit Nightmare Fwiends
description: You're now dreaming of your worst nightmare, that Chikn Nuggit and his fwiends are gonna kill you! You have to collect all the 10 Chicken Nuggets and then get out of this maze!

name: Probable
description: A daily guessing game where players attempt to maintain the longest streak of correct coin flip guesses they can. Each incorrect guess resets the streak, and the daily challenge ends after four incorrect guesses.

name: Delivering Hope
description: Get IRyS flying and deliver hope as far as you can in this hololive fangame!

name: Solar Struggle
description:
Solar Struggle is an Ultimate Doom, limit-removing (Complevel 3) community project. Each map was given a name first and then participants were invited to make a level based of it.

The first 3 episodes are comparatively easy and short, and the 4th is ramping difficulty up quite a bit. The maps are balanced for pistol-start primarily.

name: Mold
description: "Mold" is a short horror game inspired by 80's trash movies. Bringing unique tuning play and a vibe from the golden age of VHS tapes.

name: Fazbear Entertainment: Storage
description: Fazbear Entertaintment: Storage is a total revamp of Fazbear's Fright: Storage. New characters, new mechanics, a new story, and more. Taking place in the large gap between FNaF 1 and FNaF 3, FE:S seeks to merge somewhat seamlessly with the existing FNaF story, while also filling in a few gaps.

name: Carols in July
description: Carols in July is a Friday Night Funkin' mod based on hhgregg.

name: Umokay 64DS 5: Eternal Night
description: Umokay 64DS 5: Eternal Night is the fifth installment of the Umokay DS series. It is a romhack of Super Mario 64 DS, based on a Discord emote called Umokay and its many variations.

name: The Czech Run
description: The Czech Run is an infinite runner game, where you play as a typical Czech tourist, who is on vacation. Run through the mountains, dodge obstacles, and win the game.

name: Castaway of the Ardusta Sea
description: Going on another solo adventure, Aisha sets off by ship. Unfortunately, a sudden storm and the incursion of a giant sea monster hinders her path. Through the turmoil, she is thrown overboard and wakes up on an unknown island. Aisha must find her way home and survive the pirates and monsters that lurk both above ground and in the deep.

name: Pizza Death
description: Grab a slice of this fast-paced, pixel art, top-down shooter.. Pizza Death! Made by members of the Australian thrash band Pizza Death, the main soundtrack is a NES chiptune cover version of their entire debut album, Slice of Death!!!

name: Underwater World
description: Underwater World is a game that can replace your current desktop wallpaper! Discover the bottom of a flooded planet and colonize it! A very pleasant and relaxing game and its graphics will surely make your free moments more enjoyable.

name: Farmland Realm
description: The little farm is waiting for you to turn into a Farmland Realm!

name: Entropic Float
description: A free drama-mystery visual novel with a modern fantasy setting. Reach out to the fourteen people trapped inside to find the truth through eighteen endings, influenced by but not exclusively bound to your own system time.

name: Lovely Moments: Dad and Daughter
description: Jigsaw puzzle with 6 images, about day life of family and fatherhood. Enjoy playing theses scenes in 5 levels of difficulty and play minigames to increase your experience.

name: Just A Humble Swordsmith
description: Craft swords from a variety of styles and materials in order to best equip the adventurers who come into your sword smithing shop. Strategize and watch the adventurers fight their way through a dungeon full of monsters in this idle battler!

name: Drifter's Tales
description: This strategic card game invites you to live small stories in the universe of The First Spine. Choose a story and fight fearsome enemies! You may discover the secret that surrounds the Forgotten Valley.

name: Gangsta Magic
description: Gangsta magician need solve puzzles, avoid traps and enemies and find mystery USA Cone in his adventure

name: Crapette
description: Crapette is a multiplayer klondike with an ability to exploit other players mistakes (called crapettes)

name: The Sorcerer’s Detritus
description: A sokoban-like puzzle game.

name: Father and Son 2
description:
Father and Son 2 is the sequel to the first video game in the world produced by an Archaeological Museum (the MANN in Naples).
If in the first episode we had experienced the story of Michael who came to Naples to give the last farewell to his archaeologist father at the National Archaeological Museum of Naples, in Father and Son 2 we will find ourselves making important choices on the theme of love and family. The protagonist of the game this time is Gloria, already met in the past and now Michael's girlfriend. Employed at MANN as an assistant, waiting to finish her studies in Archeology, Sofia will accompany us on her journey to discover love and its many facets.
It will be a timeless love, as once again we will travel through the centuries, experiencing important chapters in the history of humanity. We will meet an ancient Etruscan in Capua in 475 BC, Cleopatra and Marco Antonio sailing in the Mediterranean and Charles Dickens at the time of his trip to Naples in 1844. Once again in the magnificent city that hosts the MANN, we will live the most tragic and exciting moments of the 4 days that shook Naples in 1943, during the Second World War.
Against the backdrop of these events, we will find ourselves visiting the halls of the MANN, one of the most important archaeological museums in the world, coming into contact with works and finds related to the historical characters present in the game.

name: Coloring Pixels: Sci-Fi Fantasy Vistas Pack
description: This Sci-Fi & Fantasy Vistas-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! The third Vistas book in Coloring Pixels, however, this iteration takes a dive into the Fictional and Fantastical!

name: Guncho
description:
Bandits are taking over the town and you're the only gunslinger around that can stop them. Battle through 5 bandit camps in this turn based rogue-like western to win the lucrative bounty or die trying.

This game is a PICO-8 version of Guncho, a 7DRL gamejam game. The original is made by Arnold Rauers and Terri Vellman.

name: Ranveer vs. Wild With Bear Grylls
description: Bear Grylls is bringing his survival skills. Ranveer Singh is bringing his endless energy. Want to lead this mission? Bring your appetite for adventure.

name: Atlantis no Puzzle
description: A short exploration puzzle-platformer where you search for items and decide which one to bring over to your next life every time you die.

name: Hat Tricks: Hare in Box
description: Put magic hats atop objects to change their behaviors, and get the rabbits to the carrots!

name: Microscopya
description: Microscopya is an adventure and puzzle game taking players on a journey through the inside of the cell, exploring its fantastical world and solving puzzles based on real molecular mechanisms.

name: Entre Laços e Amassos
description: A young woman who wants to find direction in her life moves to a big city. There she goes to a festival and has misunderstandings and disasters, losing her job, home and getting stuck on a farm with a rude Agroboy.

name: Ghost Scramble
description: A action game from XFLAG Development in Japan

name: 13 Wood St Remastered
description: 13 Wood St, a night in October: a long road, a dark forest and the house mentioned in the last will, making you the owner of a mysterious property. Welcome to 13 Wood St, a story rich horror game! Remastered 2022.

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Canada Break
description: Sin descripción

name: Crypt of the Serpent King: Remastered - 4K Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Strong Moon
description: Explore Lunaria's planet and become stronger with new allies help, Moon Shards and Strong Moon's mighty muscles.

name: Elves Fantasy: Hentai Puzzle
description: A relaxing puzzle game full of beautiful art featuring sexy elves

name: Road of Death
description: Road of Death is a 2D shooter with elements of survival and rogue-like.

name: Cows&Co
description: Cows&Co is a 2D puzzle game where you take on the role of a farmer named Ronnie.

name: Midnight Memories
description: A game with a mixture of melancholy and action. Where your main objective is to recover your memory and find your friends.

name: Sword and Fairy Inn 2
description: “Swords and Fairy Inn2 ” is a game developed by Softstar Entertainment. It includes the type of RPG, casual, simulation in it. Many roles of Sword and Fairy series come from different place to work in this Inn, live and build a warm peace family together.

name: Lost Dream: Memories
description: Lost Dream Is back bigger than ever! Explore the world as a cute little fox and go on a mission to find your forgotten piece.

name: Beltex
description: Beltex is a casual factory game played on a hex map. Extract numbers. Combine them using mathematical operations. Deliver them using belts across a huge map. Unlock new buildings and upgrades.

name: Cards of the Dreaming Dragons
description: How well do you know your friends? Cards of the Dreaming Dragons is the ultimate tabletop game you can play with your friends and family. Figure out what they are thinking and deceive them to win.

name: Elemates
description: Elemates is an action-adventure game about a rebellious girl out to prove her worth in the heroic trials of her tribe. There, she finds an unlikely ally in her grumpy guide. As a team, prevail through the mighty god Quetzal's temple and use the Band of Humility to unleash powerful, elemental spells.

name: Courage
description: "Courage" is a slasher with RPG elements, in a medieval setting, with a dark and gloomy atmosphere. The goal of the game is to advance through the levels and exterminate all the undead, then you can go further.

name: The Secret of Rooms
description: "the Secret of Rooms" is a drama-oriented puzzle-solving game in a modern setting. By searching for the item clues in each room,find the truth of the case in the game.Different choices in the game will unlock different endings and bring players a new puzzle solving experience.

name: Kenomaze
description: Explore a strange maze full of colorful friends and foes. When the time comes, the path you’ve chosen will determine your fate... and perhaps the fate of others as well.

name: Formula Bit Racing DX
description: Formula Bit Racing DX is a fun arcade racing game, where each curve and lap recreate classic gameplay and offers you unbound speed limits of fun. Full throttle and enjoy!

name: Dark Jungle
description: Dark Jungle is a 2d fantasy adventure where you play as the great magician Dorian and find yourself in a fairytale forest.

name: Backroom Beyond
description:
Backroom Beyond is a first-person game that mixes puzzles with single-player adventure in a dark, harrowing environment that makes the player question the protagonist's sanity. Based on the internet myth, Backroom Beyond goes further and makes the player wonder if that journey is about something more personal than anything else.

The narrative has two main points. Drawings tell part of the game's story on the walls. The drawings have no defined authorship, which gives them an extra degree of strangeness. The second point is the existence of The Guide, a being that instigates the players to think about their actions in real life.

The game basically has one objective throughout its 40-level journey: place the red box over the red button and open the door to the next level. It seems simple at first, but it's not. Each environment has its own logic. If the players feel frustrated because something went wrong in their strategy, they can press the “wake up again" button, which will return them to the beginning of the level.

name: Hacker life simulator
description: Take a team of hackers under your strict guidance and become known to the whole world. Expand your hideout and hack various companies around the world. Become the most famous group in the world!

name: A Turd: The Game
description: You had to come back and find evidences against your abuser but... She was already there... Ransack your house and avoid her at any cost! She will hit you and make you crazy... ! Will you find all the evidences and leave the house before loosing your mind?

name: Cowboy Girl
description: In the Wild West, very terrible and foreign monsters have been found up with which you, as the young Cowboy Girl, who recently bought her first revolver, has to fight with them!

name: 180 Seconds
description: In the period of 180 seconds you will analyze every object in your house... when the ambulance passes, the thunder, and the ringing of the phone. You live during the time of a pandemic and your mission is to use your real-world knowledge that you have learned about viruses. Would you be infected?

name: Spellslinger VR
description: In Spellslinger VR you will run into a variety of monsters, puzzles, and challenges you must overcome by casting a wide array of elementally-aligned spells. The core gameplay comes from its unique spellcasting system, where stringing together specific arm and hand movements casts spells.

name: The Meaning
description: "The meaning" is a psychological horror game, where you should expect the unexpected, It's a story about a man, who have lost everything & everyone. You'll view the life of Ethen Daniels from his perspective and submerged in the deep and sad reality of his life.

name: Canterz Paranormies
description: Canterz Paranormies is a 2D Top Down survival horror game based on the story of the most renowned paranormal investigation team of the US called "Canterz Paranormies" who got a request from the owner of the Texas Haunted house to investigate it for the paranormal evidence.

name: Grid Words
description: The next generation of word games has arrived…

name: Knights of Fate
description: The Triskelion Knights are an elite force selected and trained to protect the country. They're the King's right hand and they are now called to the biggest mission of their lives, to stop a Shaman from regaining his full powers and starting another war for the souls of the people.

name: Seven Deadly Dates
description: You've studied latin for a few months and you accidentally read a passage from your textbook which lands you in a demon speed dating bar. Unsure of how to get home, you decide to ride it out and see how things go. Maybe you'll even find a date! Or maybe you'll find death? Who knows...

name: Vowel Movements
description: In Vowel Movements you race against the clock to group words together into categories. The only catch is that each of the vowels has been replaced by a different vowel. Surely that can’t make things too difficult…

name: Who Shuffled My Shapes?
description: Your shapes have been shuffled and it’s up to you to fix them! Get your 20 new puzzles back in order, it sounds simple but it’s not. With some of the simpler puzzles offering over 43 quintillion possible configurations finding the single correct one will be a challenge!

name: Alumni: Escape Room Adventure
description: Play as a scientist transported back in time to memories of college, trying to escape the nightmare reality. Explore areas and take in your surroundings. Use all of your puzzle solving skills to make your way through the college and return back to the present.

name: Aegis Descent
description: In this fast-paced roguelite vehicle shooter, WW2 is drawing to a close and a secret testing facility is overrun by an unknown alien force. The best pilots of the war are asked to take on one more perilous mission, to descend into the caverns below the facility and face this new threat.

name: Madison: Possessed Edition
description:
Madison is a first person psychological horror game that delivers an immersive and terrifying experience. With the help of an instant camera, connect the human world with the beyond, take pictures and develop them by yourself. Solve puzzles, explore your surroundings and most importantly, survive.
Possessed Edition:
• Base Game
• 2 Ritual Cards
• 2 Instant Photos
• Blue Knees' Book
• Blue Knee's Music Sheet
• Digital Content:
o Camera DLC pack
o All 5 Ritual Cards, Priest Tapes, Blue Knees Song, and Official Wallpapers

name: Exodemic
description: Destroy aliens, dash between planets, and buy powerful upgrades. Exodemic is a compact roguelike that combines frenetic shoot 'em up gameplay with a procedurally generated overworld filled with vendors, trading hubs, and combat encounters. Race against the clock to save the human race.

name: Fantasy Adventure
description: Barrage shooting game, a game with minimalist gameplay and roguelite elements There are 25 small spaces in the game, and there are monsters in each space. After completing the challenge monsters, enter the next space.

name: SnackHunter
description: Enchanted snacks face off against hungry mages in this chaotic game of hide-and-seek. Host SnackHunter on your PC and join with your friends on your smartphone. Whether online or locally, with up to 16 players, the party can start now!

name: StarFlint the BlackHole Prophecy
description: Adventure game, puzzle platform and strategic space battles in a sci-fi universe. Many puzzles and riddles in a cartoon atmosphere in 2D and 3D.

name: Klonoa Phantasy Reverie Series
description: Klonoa is back! Klonoa Phantasy Reverie Series brings back Klonoa: Door to Phantomile and Klonoa 2: Lunatea’s Veil remastered in one collection to fans new and old. Get ready to set off on an adventure to save the world!

name: Classified Stories: Color Out of Space
description: A short, free, horror adventure game set in our days, inspired by Lovecraft novel: The Colour Out of Space.

name: Yaso: Curse of Soirée
description: A new horror game from the creator of GOHOME, Itimatu Suzuka! This is a rhythm horror adventure game set in a Western-style house from the Meiji era.

name: Intruder in Antiquonia
description: In this classic point-and-click adventure, Sarah does not remember how she got to Antiquonia, but she has plenty of time to unravel the puzzle of her past as she explores the town where the Internet is not welcome. A beautiful adventure with high-resolution 2D graphics and a lovely soundtrack.

name: Deep Space Salvage Crew VR
description: A first-person procedural VR roguelike shooter, set in deep space. Find old wrecks adrift in space, board them and fight your way to the bridge to claim the salvage rights.

name: Scary Buddies
description: Play online in VR with 3-15 players in a mysterious mansion, identify the killer and get him down!

name: Madison
description: Madison is a first person psychological horror game that delivers an immersive and terrifying experience. With the help of an instant camera, connect the human world with the beyond, take pictures and develop them by yourself. Solve puzzles, explore your surroundings and most importantly, survive.

name: Super Donald World 2020
description: Build The Wall along the southern border of the United States in this 2.5D runner!

name: Dragon Forge
description: Tigerfyre is a base building adventure game about managing massive amounts of resources by foraging and crafting. Born a dragon in a cursed land you must work to lift the curse by creating abundance.

name: Instant War
description:
Embark into a military strategy RTS game, in a world where your battle tactics and your army strategy are the keys to victory.
Instant war : Ultimate Warfare delivers an amazing battlefield experience. As a commander, you must develop your military base and lead your army (tanks, soldiers, anti-aircraft units, etc..) through the battles in order to climb the ranks of this 4X RTS tank war game.

Join an alliance and defeat your opponents, using a large action pannel available : army reinforcement, battle tactics, real-time strategy, assault forces, drone and even airstrike. In this 4X game, you can fight for strategic territories or ressources points.
Chose wisely how to manage your ressources and massive army in order to defend your base from the other players. All your actions are in real-time strategy, so you can cooperate with your friend in order to defeat the toughest foes. As a multiplayer 4X game, the key to your victory will be your military strategy.

name: Occupy White Walls
description: To say it’s a PC sandbox-building, AI-driven MMO where people play with Art, developed by folks who really love architecture and abstract characters… would be a bit of a mouthful.

name: Minion Masters: Kaboom Kingdom
description:
The KaBOOM Kingdom DLC is a great +300% value bundle that gives you what you need to build your own Scrat deck, including the legendary Wreckinator 9000! It also gives you a headstart in this month’s Season Pass.

Includes:
- 3x Wreckinator 9000 (Legendary)
- 5x Boom Buggy (Supreme)
- 20x Scrat Tank
- 40x Zeppelin Bomber
- 40x Cannon Roller
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 3x Season Pass Tiers

Roll out the heavy machinery with this Scrat pack that lets you roll over your opponents. Let the Mighty Wreckinator and Scrat Tank plow down smaller enemies while protecting your Boom Buggy and Cannon Roller and let them deal out the damage from safety.
With this DLC, you have the perfect Scrat kit to become King of the Scrats!

name: The Necromancer's Tower
description: Sin descripción

name: Klonoa 2: Lunatea's Veil
description: Klonoa 2: Lunatea's Veil is a remaster of the original 2.5D platformer game, released for modern consoles with enhanced graphics. The game was bundled with Klonoa: Door to Phantomile in the Phantasy Reverie Series. This is actually the first time Lunatea's Veil has had any sort of rerelease since its debut on the PS2.

name: Klonoa: Door to Phantomile
description: Klonoa: Door to Phantomile is a remaster of the original 2.5D platformer game, released for modern consoles with enhanced graphics. The game was bundled with Klonoa 2: Lunatea’s Veil in the Phantasy Reverie series. This version is actually a remaster of the 2008 Wii remake, simply titled Klonoa, with the character designs and colors remaining more faithful to the original PS1 game.

name: Silver Stars of Wisdom
description: Sin descripción

name: Matchpoint: Tennis Championships - Legends DLC
description: Play two of the biggest Tennis legends in history!

name: Crab Island
description: Sin descripción

name: Just Kiss Him Already!
description: "Just Kiss Him Already!" is a fluffy high school boys love story about two idiots who need a gentle push in the right direction to get together — and you're here to help with that!

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Conton City Vote Pack
description:
・3 New Characters: Goku (Ultra Instinct -Sign-), Dyspo, Vegeta (GT)
・2 Extra Missions
・4 New Parallel Quests
・10 Additional Moves
・4 Costumes/Accessories
・5 Super Souls
・15 Illustrations

name: Oita, Beppu Mystery Annai: Yuganda Tourou
description: Sin descripción

name: Time From Earth
description:
Time From Earth is a narrative adventure game where you'll experience a day-to-day system, speaking to everyone & completing tasks and at the end of the day, head back to the accommodation to start the next day.

Play through simple mini-games to help maintain the ship and learn about what's happened in the 30 years between now and the flight of Physis 5.
Uncover a mystery onboard the ship...

name: Thief Simulator VR: Greenview Street
description:
Have you ever wondered what it's like to be a real thief? Now you can see for yourself in Thief Simulator VR - an immersive experience of being a minor burglar - without any unnecessary violence.

Steal in free roam sandbox neighborhoods. Observe your target and gather information that will help you with the burglary. Take the challenge and rob the best secured houses. Buy some hi-tech burglar equipment and learn new thief tricks. Sell stolen goods to the passers. Do anything that a real thief does. And… don’t get caught!

A good thief always observes his target. What's inside? Who lives there? What's your target day schedule? Find out when the house is empty and if there are any nosy neighbors. Choose from lots of possible approaches and tools to prepare the best plan and execute it without drawing attention.

name: Kill It With Fire: Exterminator Edition
description: The ultimate spider hunting experience!

name: Retro Pocket Rocket
description: Launch your rocket into a new galaxy in the Retro Pocket Rocket universe. Join our astronauts and get an interstellar score by destroying asteroids.

name: Forza Horizon 5: 2019 Nissan 370Z Nismo
description: Forza Horizon 5 2019 Nissan 370Z Nismo

name: Art7
description: 1-bit Art Gallery for the Playdate console

name: Arcade Archives: Rabio Lepus
description: "Rabio Lepus" is a shooting game released by Video System in 1987.

name: Dicey Dungeons Reunion
description: This is a major new DLC for the game – six new episodes, one for each contestant. There’s new music, new art, new equipment, and of course new gameplay!

name: Gwent: Rogue Mage
